meanings.sent1: Unluckily, he tripped over a rock and fell.
meanings.sent2: She unluckily missed the bus to work this morning.
meanings.sent3: Unluckily, the cat knocked over the vase again.
meanings.sent4: The storm unluckily hit right during their outdoor wedding.
meanings.sent5: Unluckily, the lottery ticket turned out to be a dud.

meanings.sent1: Unluckily, it started raining during the picnic.
meanings.sent2: He unluckily forgot his wallet at home.
meanings.sent3: Unluckily, the ice cream shop was closed when they arrived.
meanings.sent4: The car unluckily broke down on the highway.
meanings.sent5: Unluckily, she missed the important meeting due to traffic.
